ygData.subject: Re: KILL BH
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobias comm begins to chirp. Good one of my babies got through. Hears Kluster ask his question, I m glad to see we re still on good terms.. As I said in our

Phobias comm begins to chirp."Good one of my babies got through." Hears
Kluster ask his question, "I'm glad to see we're still on good terms.. As I
said in our meeting I was stationed onboard a Predacon warship when the
temporal wave hit. Some trader scavengers showed up planning to take
everything they needed. I convinced them that since I was part of that ship
it was my property. I have with me enough Predacon technology that it won't
only power your, um my, um the engines, it may have enough power to get you
back to cybertron if you should choose. After of course you destroy the Iron
Fist and all it's crew."

He sees Klusters expression and knows how tempting the offer sounds. "So are
you interested? I need to know, I'm sure I can find other Transformers who
may be interested in that kind of technology."


----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 1:20 PM
Subject: Re: KILL BH


> ::Striker/Firearm/Kluster/Rex/Ramulus/Smokescreen::
>
> Striker sighs as he sees BH and Blastrage arrive. More suicidal
attackers...
> He aims his missile launcher, firing it at the skimmer.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "WOOHOO!!" Firearm yells as the Newcomers retreat, turning his weapon at
BH's
> and Blastrage's skimmer, firing rapidly from his arm gun and from his
> heavy-fire rifle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster nods as Phobia's message plays back, then recieving Hot Rod's
> transmission.
>
> "I'm taking care of something, Hot Rod," he replies, then looks at the
bug.
>
> "Send responce," he says to it, then begins his message, "I'm listening,
> Phobia, how are you planning to replace the engines?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Rex growls as the new attackers arrive, opening fire on BH with his
> heavy-fire rifle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus and Smokescreen spin around as the new attackers come in, firing
at
> BH and Blastrage with their guns. Smokescreen throws a charge at the
skimmer,
> set to explode on impact.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Cybertronian Fire's autoguns take out most of the grenades, the
shields
> absorbing the rest of the impact.
>
> The missile launchers spin around, firing two rockets at the skimmer along
> with all four of the laser batteries.
>
> The EMP cannons take aim, firing their paralizing ray at the skimmer.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Remember four years of good friends, bad clothes, explosive chemistry
> experiments.
